quotes.quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let it go.
quotes.author: - Carol Burnett

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: - Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: There is nothing impossible to they who will try.
quotes.author: - Alexander the Great

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: - Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You define your own life. Don't let other people write your script.
quotes.author: - Oprah Winfrey
